detail_desc: Loose-fitting, V-neck top in lightweight, slub-weave sweatshirt fabric with raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Slightly wider jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length boiler suit in washed denim with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, and side and back pockets. Waist with elastication at the back and a detachable D-ring belt, and wide, tapered legs with a decorative seam at the back of the hems.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.

Trainers in fabric and imitation leather with imitation suede details, a padded edge and tongue, hook and loop fastening and elasticated lacing at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Thin top in sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and a faux fur front with embroidery and applications. Slightly longer at the back.
Adjustable elastic braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood, zip down the front, front pockets and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Soft pile lining.
T-shirts in soft jersey with a wide neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a gently rounded hem.
Boys' briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined crotch.
Baby Exclusive. Shorts in soft organic cotton slub jersey with an elasticated waist and frill-trimmed legs and hems.
Non-wired triangle bra in microfibre and lace with moulded cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Wide fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Small hairbrush that folds into a compact with a mirror. Diameter 7 cm.

Washed cotton twill joggers in a relaxed style with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, welt back pockets, and slightly lower crotch. Tapered legs with decorative seams at the knees and elasticated hems. Regular fit.
Jersey T-shirt with a wide neck and chest pocket.
Trainers with lacing at the front, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover front, long sleeves and an elasticated hem.
Slides in imitation leather with thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Boys' briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined crotch.

Short jacket in corduroy with metal buttons. Pile-lined collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, and side pockets. Buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab and button at the sides. Pile lining.
Fully lined, textured bikini bottoms with a high waist.
Loafers with a decorative tab and seam at the front. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 1.5 cm.
Thin metal chain necklace with two rectangular pendants in different sizes. Length approx. 70 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim, straight legs.
Top in light, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless, V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with a rounded hem and slits in the sides.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with mesh sections. Mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and full coverage at the back.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Fitted mini dress in jacquard-patterned organza made of recycled polyester containing glittery threads. Deep V-neck with wide grosgrain ties,a concealed zip at the back, rounded shoulders and long, wide sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs. Lined in partly recycled polyester.
Imitation leather ankle boots with elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles. Heel 8 cm.
Polo-neck tops in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a sewn-in wrapover at the front with a decorative bow at one side.
Fitted, knee-length skirt in a textured weave with a high waist, concealed zip at the back and decorative sparkly stone buttons down the front. Lined.

Blouse in airy chiffon with a small frilled collar with a tie at the neck and V-neck with buttons at the front. Long raglan sleeves with a button and small frill trim at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and flounced hem.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Vest top with a racer back and rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved Henley shirt in ribbed organic cotton jersey with a button placket and ribbed cuffs.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft brushed twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Soft, non-wired bras in jersey with lace trims, adjustable shoulder straps and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Top in soft pile with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and a narrow trim at the cuffs and hem.

Oversized shirt jacket in woven fabric with a soft brushed inside. Collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button and diagonal side pockets. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Top in cotton jersey with a wider neckline, low dropped shoulders and short sleeves with a flounced trim.

Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather. Flap with appliqués, plastic beads, metal studs and a metal snap lock, and a narrow shoulder strap with a chain fastening. The bag is divided into two inside and has a small inner compartment. Size approx. 8x14x19 cm.
Short, fitted dress in stretch fabric with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and wide ribbing at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing at the waist for a comfortable fit.

Soft nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with jersey-lined, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Decorative lace trims, slightly wider, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.

Suit trousers in a slub-weave linen and wool blend containing some polyester with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Velvet choker and a longer metal necklace. The choker has a spider-shaped decoration with sparkly stones. The longer necklace is shaped like a spider’s web. Adjustable lengths, 32-40 cm and 39.5-47.5 cm.
Cold shoulder blouse in a viscose weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elastication and a flounce at the top, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a smocked hem.
Fitted, short-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a small stand-up collar. Gathered yoke front and back, concealed buttons down the front and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and ties.

Kangol x H&M. Oversized, knee-length cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with an intarsia-knit Kangol kangaroo on the back. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and slim-fitting cuffs with ribbed trims. Rib-trimmed patch front pockets, one with the Kangol logo, and ribbing at the hem. No fasteners.
Long-sleeved dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and zip at the back, Elasticated seam and a flounce at the waist. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with frills down the front, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined. The cotton content of the dress is organic.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt, zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit with a sheen, with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Metal belt. Width 2.5 cm.

Padded, fleece-lined all-in-one suit in water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, lined, faux fur-trimmed hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, a zipped chest pocket and elastication at the back of the waist, cuffs and hems. Reinforced back and legs and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Reflective details. The suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Soft nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with an elasticated hem and functional fastening for easier nursing access.
Cardigan knitted in soft cotton with long sleeves and buttons down the front.
Jacket in soft pile with a collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a reversible sequin motif on the front.
Boxy-style top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem.
Cotton twill chinos in a relaxed fit with a zip fly and button, side pockets, flap back pockets with a button and straight, gently tapered legs.

Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Straight-cut shirt in woven fabric with a stripe print. Collar, buttons down the front, yoke at the back, dropped shoulders and buttoned cuffs.

Short dress in sequined mesh with a small stand-up collar and an opening with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck. Rounded, draped shoulders and long raglan sleeves. Jersey lining made from recycled polyester.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif, round neckline and gently rounded hem.
High-waisted jersey trousers with contrasting colour side stripes, an elasticated waist and wide, ankle-length legs with sewn-in creases .
Shopper in batik-patterned cotton canvas with a zip at the top and two wide handles with fringes at the ends. Unlined. Depth 8 cm. Height 41 cm. Width 54 cm.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Gently tailored jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the front, welt front pockets, and 3/4-length sleeves with gathers at the cuffs. Lined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Loose-fitting vest top in airy linen jersey with a V-neck.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
